database

Class MapLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.MapLoader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DBMapLoader

    public abstract class MapLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which allows subclasses to load specific maps with game information.
    Author:
    Michael Williams

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String name
      Map name.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapLoader() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Map loadMap(Display display, GameInfo game)
      Loads Map using Implementation specific backend.
      protected abstract DatabaseInterface.MapSpecs openMap()
      Pulls the map Specs for the Map to load from, should it be in Binary format.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • name

        protected java.lang.String name
        Map name. Used for Identification in several storage backends. For files this would be the filename with the extension removed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapLoader

        public MapLoader()

    • Method Detail

      • loadMap

        public abstract Map loadMap(Display display,
          GameInfo game)
        Loads Map using Implementation specific backend. Returned Map is then ready to play on.
        Parameters:
        display - Display to show the map on.
        game - Game this map is associated with.
        Returns:
        New Map to Play on.

      • openMap

        protected abstract DatabaseInterface.MapSpecs openMap()
        Pulls the map Specs for the Map to load from, should it be in Binary format. Parsed String based formats will not need to use this function.
        Returns:
        Info on the map.
